required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characterization of Phenotypes of Occupational Asthma
clinical_study.official_title: Characterization of Phenotypes of Occupational Asthma: Descriptive Study

brief_summary.textblock: The general objective of this multicenter, international study is to perform a multivariate descriptive analysis of a large population of well-defined subjects with sensitizer-induced OA ascertained by a positive SIC result in order to provide more information on the characteristics of this condition.

primary_outcome.measure: Retrospective study to perform a multi-varied descriptive analysis of a cohort of patients with occupational asthma confirmed by a specific inhalation test
primary_outcome.time_frame: The period from from January 1st, 2006 to December 31st, 2015 will be examined

study_pop.textblock: Patient who performed a specific inhalation test with a positive result between january 2006 and december 2015.- Subject giving their consent for their participation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult Patient
- Patient who performed a specific inhalation test with a positive result between January 2006 and December 2015.- Subject giving their consent for their participation
- Patient agreeing to use his data for research purposes
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient objecting to the use of his data for research purposes
- Subjects under safeguard of justice
- Subject under guardianship or curatorship

facility.name: Service de pneumologie, d'allergologie et de pathologie de l'environnement
